active_learning.discussion_prompt: Debate the effectiveness of signature-based vs. behavioral detection for DGAs, considering MITRE ATT&CK T1568.002. Provide real-world examples from APT campaigns (e.g., Conficker or modern botnets) and evaluate trade-offs in false positives/negatives.
active_learning.peer_teaching: Explain the key concepts to a partner without using technical jargon.

additional_activities.activity: Think-pair-share on DGA misconceptions (e.g., 'DGAs are truly random' vs. algorithmic predictability).
Role-play: Students simulate threat actors generating DGAs vs. hunters detecting them, debating TTPs from MITRE ATT&CK.
Hands-on: Python simulation of DGA generation (e.g., simple seed-based algo) and detection (entropy/wordlist checks).
